content: I think I'll start by hanging a few lights at the center point of the wall and then work my way outward in a gentle, sweeping motion. I'll vary the height of the lights to add some visual interest and keep the cord loose to create a relaxed look. Do you think it's a good idea to add some greenery, like eucalyptus or ferns, to the walls or windows to bring in some natural elements and add some texture to the space?
